p: Out of 26 DENV2-infected blood samples 24 scored positive in qRT-PCR with cycle threshold (C T) values ranging from 21.57â€“29.13 ( Table 2, column 2). In a first test DENV2 RT-LAMP detected 17/24 (70.8% positive samples) with initial time to positive (T T) values between 37 and 89 min ( Table 2, column 3).
